TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Derrick_Alston, title = Derrick_Alston, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Derrick_Alston} }

S.FORM: Derrick Alston nalecuhan i The Bronx, New York, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Derrick Alston i 1994 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 33, namapili' tu nu Philadelphia 76ers putiput. 8 bulad 20 demiad, 1972 a mihca, Derrick Alston, miunduay.

Derrick Alston nalecohan i The Bronx, New York, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Derrick Alston i 1994 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ko owac ato silsil 33, namapili' to no Philadelphia 76ers potipot. 8 bolad 20 demiad, 1972 a mihca, Derrick Alston, miondoay.
